results.title: Simvastatin mitigates diabetic nephropathy by upregulating farnesoid X receptor and Nrf2/HO-1 signaling and attenuating oxidative stress and inflammation in rats.
results.text_hl: The @CHEMICAL_Cholesterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002784 @@@cholesterol@@@-lowering drug @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SIM@@@) has shown promising effects against @<m>DISEASE_Diabetic_Nephropathies</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003928 @@@diabetic nephropathy@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Diabetic_Nephropathies</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003928 @@@DN@@@).

results.title: [Effect of electroacupuncture of "Biao-Ben" acupoints on renal function and hemorheology and eNOS level in patients with early diabetic nephropathy].
results.text_hl: OBJECTIVE: To observe the effect of electroacupuncture (EA) of "Biao-Ben acupoints" (Biao indicates pathogenic factors of disease; Ben refers to body constitution) on renal function, hemorheology and @GENE_NOS3 @GENE_4846 @@@endothelial nitric oxide synthase@@@ (@GENE_NOS3 @GENE_4846 @@@eNOS@@@) level in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with early @<m>DISEASE_Diabetic_Nephropathies</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003928 @@@diabetic kidney disease@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Diabetic_Nephropathies</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003928 @@@DKD@@@), so as to explore its mechanism underlying relieving early @<m>DISEASE_Diabetic_Nephropathies</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003928 @@@DKD@@@.

[Effect of electroacupuncture of "Biao-Ben" acupoints on renal function and hemorheology and eNOS level in patients with early diabetic nephropathy]. Zhen Ci Yan Jiu. 2022 Jan 25;47(1):46-52. results.title: Rhein improves renal lesion and ameliorates dyslipidemia in db/db mice with diabetic nephropathy.
results.text_hl: Rhein is a new drug that can decrease @CHEMICAL_Lipids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008055 @@@lipid@@@ levels and protect against @<m>DISEASE_Diabetic_Nephropathies</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003928 @@@DN@@@ progression in a different fashion with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@.

results.title: Simvastatin ameliorates diabetic nephropathy by attenuating oxidative stress and apoptosis in a rat model of streptozotocin-induced type 1 diabetes.
results.text_hl: The present study investigates the ameliorative effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SIM@@@) on @<m>DISEASE_Diabetic_Nephropathies</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003928 @@@diabetic nephropathy@@@ in @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@, pointing to its anti-apoptotic and anti-oxidative stress efficacies.

results.title: Targeting of RhoA/ROCK signaling ameliorates progression of diabetic nephropathy independent of glucose control.
results.text_hl: In the current study, we hypothesized that pharmacological blockade of the @GENE_RHOA @GENE_11848 @@@RhoA@@@/ROCK pathway with either @CHEMICAL_fasudil @CHEMICAL_MESH:C049347 @@@fasudil@@@ or @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ would ameliorate progression of @<m>DISEASE_Diabetic_Nephropathies</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003928 @@@diabetic nephropathy@@@.

results.title: Simvastatin reverses podocyte injury but not mesangial expansion in early stage type 2 diabetes mellitus.
results.text_hl: Statins may confer renal protection in a variety of @DISEASE_Kidney_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D007674 @@@glomerular diseases@@@, including @<m>DISEASE_Diabetic_Nephropathies</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003928 @@@diabetic nephropathy@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Diabetic_Nephropathies</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003928 @@@DN@@@).
